code: import React from'react';import styles from'../App/App.module.css';import Track from'../Track/Track';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Tracklist(_ref){let{tracks,onSelectTrack,selectedTracks=[]}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.Tracklist,children:tracks.map(track=>{const isSelected=selectedTracks.some(t=>t.id===track.id);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.track,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[track.name," - ",track.artist," (",track.album,")"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onSelectTrack(track),className:isSelected?styles.unselectButton:styles.button,children:isSelected?"Remove":"Add to my playlist"})]},track.id);})});};export default Tracklist;
